contents:
知乎上有好多这样的二逼问题，比如：中国也可能出现经济危机吗？以前我发过一个回答，第二天就被删了。大意...

这真是中国特色政治笑话。

The Politburo in China is concerned with a coming economic crisis, so they posted a lot questions on social media asking Chinese people if there is any possibility of an economic crisis. Then, they arrested every respondent and put them in concentration camps, and considered the economic crisis resolved.
